title: "Using Positive Fascination in Therapy Techniques"
first_phrase: In the previous section of this text, researchers analyzed the impact of a fear-erasing technique on human behavior. The study revealed that fear memories can only be erased if the fear-removal action is completed quickly after the fear stimulus is re-experienced. Now, let's explore a different and highly effective hypnosis technique called "Indian Self-Hypnosis." This technique focuses on using visualization and rhythmic breathing to enhance creativity and problem-solving abilities. This section also highlights the differences between the conscious and unconscious mind during work.
content: Slide “Autoipnosi Indiana” 1 - Creare Immagine (V A K) entrare all’interno e toccare come se foste un bambino 2 – Dal cuore (nostro) mandate emozioni ad altri ed a voi (Win Win = Vinci Vinci) 3 – Portare (Collegare) la scena all’ombelico 4 – Iniziare Respirazioni ritmiche col naso (6-3-6) con l’intenzione di caricarsi di energia come una pila 4 bis - Osservare luce – portare occhi in convergenza al 3° occhio 5 – Inspirare – Trattenere – Soffiare sapendo che inviamo scena nella realtà 6 – Dire “Grazie” ! Utilizziamo ora la luce per Creatività e Problem Solving Slide “Creatività” Chiarificarsi le idee Fase 1 (semina) - Pensare quello che si vuole (espresso con poche parole) mentre si osserva la luce Fase 2 (neve) – Chiudere occhi ed osservare traccia Fase 3 (germoglio) – Cosa ci viene in mente? last_phrase: In conclusion, the techniques of autohypnosis and visualization presented in this exercise can help you tap into the power of your unconscious mind and increase your creativity and problem-solving abilities. By practicing exercises like the mirror exercise and the group exercise, you can transform your life and overcome anxieties and worries. Remember that the key to success is having a lucid and subtle spirit that generates pure blood, which can send powerful rays of imagination and touch the hearts and spirits of others.
